name: dialup-deploy
description: A simple way to deploy websites with automatic SSL and subdomains

scripts.build:all: bun run clear:dist && bun run --filter='@keithk/deploy-*' build
scripts.setup:local: bun run build:all && ROOT_DIR=$(pwd)/sites bun --cwd packages/cli setup local
scripts.setup:production: bun run build:all && ROOT_DIR=$(pwd)/sites bun --cwd packages/cli setup production
scripts.setup: bun run build:all && ROOT_DIR=$(pwd)/sites bun --cwd packages/cli setup local
